snippet: The tradition of castell building has become a rallying point of national pride as the region goes into a straw vote on independence from Spain.
abstract: Catalonian tradition of castell building has become rallying point of national pride as region presses to break away from Spain in coming straw vote; many see spectacle, in which people build human towers of over 3 stories high, as metaphor for independence.
lead_paragraph: The tradition of castell building has become a rallying point of national pride as the region goes into a straw vote on independence from Spain.

headline.seo: Video Feature: Catalan Castells in Vilafranca del Penedès
headline.main: Catalonia’s Human Towers as a Metaphor for Independence
headline.print_headline: Human Towers of Catalonia Rise as a Metaphor for Independence
